info.title: Schema of Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ResourceManagementCreatedOrUpdatedEventD.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.CreatedOrUpdated event.

ResourceManagementDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.Deleted event.
